forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of drizzle between 11pm and 5am. Partly cloudy, with a low around 56. West southwest wind 10 to 17 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

forecast.name: Tuesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 65, with temperatures falling to around 63 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 9 to 21 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph.

weather_report:
As twilight begins to weave its delicate shadow over Downtown San Francisco, the city stands on the cusp of a night marked by a slight chance of drizzle, whispering faintly between the hours of 11 PM and 5 AM. The skies, partly cloaked, hint at their evolving grace, while a gentle breeze from the west southwest nudges through at 10 to 17 miles per hour, perhaps carrying the memory of the day past, when the sun graced us with its presence. As the temperature settles into a comfortable embrace around 56 degrees, the atmosphere invites a proper layering of garments—think light sweaters or jackets—to accommodate the evening's slight chill.

Tomorrow promises a breath of sunshine as the high climbs to a near-harmonious 65 degrees, with a serenade of winds cascading 9 to 21 miles per hour, gusting to 26. The day’s charm lies in its promise of clear blue skies, calling forth the contemplative wanderers and casual observers to enjoy the urban canvas unfurling under a warm glow. Perhaps a stroll along the Embarcadero will suit those seeking serenity, or one might indulge in the simple pleasure of sipping a warm drink at a local café, savoring the atmosphere of a city perpetually inspired by the sea. The clarity of the day will surely lend itself to convoked conversations and leisurely moments, encouraging all to pause and listen to the vibrant pulse of San Francisco.
